ゲームの仕組みは面白いです。この面だけならおすすめはできます。
しかし、キラーのマッチ結果が厳しめ、サバイバーがチャットや屈伸で煽ってくる(全逃げされてしまう上にEZなどもチャットで書き込まれたこともあります)、ゲームバランス調整でキラーだけ弱体化が多いなど、キラーだけ冷遇が多いため到底初心者がキラーをやりたいと思う環境ではないです。つまり、キラーがいなくなるので、サバイバーでマッチ待機時間も長いです。(キラーは1分程度でマッチできます。)
総括すると、ゲームの仕組みは面白いがゲームバランスが悪い傾向であることとプレイヤーのモラルの低い人がいるため、現時点ではおすすめできません。初心者がキラーもサバイバー両方気軽にできる環境になるまで待った方が良いです。(両方プレイすればコツも分かるようになりますが今は格差マッチで練習にもならない時がありますので初心者に両方とも楽しくできるゲームバランスになるまで待つ方が良いです。)

※キラーやる人は特にプロフィールなどはよくチェックしてパーティなら退出をおすすめします。たいていは連携とられるので勝てません。

I think this game is pretty cool to play with friends. This game is a lot about doing stuff together, cooperating and trying to get away from killer. I'd say 7/10. If you are medium player - this game might look sometimes too hard for you. Of course "pro players" say that killers are always underpowered and stuff, but what I see is that ofter killer gets all 4 kills. So if you're a medium player and not a dbd nerd - it will be sometimes hard for ya, prepare to loose sometimes x3 But overall its very nice game, interesting and every round something different happens~

This game has a really good idea, you can play as a Killer or as one of 4 survivers, which has two totally different kind of playstyles. But i would never recommend this to a casual player because the matchmaking is...lets say, it didn't exist. if you are new to this game fighting rank 3 players which have everything unlocked is, from my point of view, not funny for both sides. And if you think that this is something that will be in 1 of 10 games you will totally be surpriesed.

El juego es muy divertido para echar unas partidas, te lo pasas bien las primeras horas pero como en la mayoría de juegos cooperativos adolece de problemas graves, en gran parte por el tipo de comunidad que atraen. Súmale que hay bugs y el hit box es muy falso. Además, cuenta con la mayor cantidad de toxicidad que he visto en un juego de estas características. Es común el uso de premades hiper tóxicas que sin venir ni a cuento empiezan a hacer tea bags, los insultos tras la partida suelen ser recurrentes, y lo peor es lo poco balanceado que está el juego, haciendo de prácticas antideportivas como el facecampeo y el tuneleo práctica más que recomendable para subir easy.
Desde hace un tiempo no paro de ver tuneleros, camperos y gente usando el NOED. 
Hace unos meses cuando le daba más, no veía tantos, pero NO os recomiendo este juego ahora mismo ya que cada 2 partidas os vais a encontrar eso y es bastante frustrante, no hay diversión, os aconsejo que busquéis otra alternativa a esto que esté más balanceado, al menos hasta que los developers hagan algo contra el facecampeo o algo, que quiten la puntuación al killer que este a ciertos metros del colgado o alguna historia así. Y no sirve decir "si campea, repara", no porque la mayoria de veces el tipo colgado se suicida o sino lleva familia, vamos los tres a salvarlo y nadie reparar (en los casos de matchmaking). Y cuando ni el campeo ni el tuneleo le funciona para matar a los 4, llevan el NOED y te tiran de un golpe, sin tener opción a quitar el totem ya que no da tiempo para buscarlo, abrir puerta y descolgar al survivor. Muy mal planteado, los killers se han acostumbrado a subir así, y no es divertido. Lo peor es que te afecta a tu forma de jugar, personalmente me gusta jugar con el killer a persecución, pero si te cuelga y te campea, poco puedes hacer que dedicarte a reparar y punto. Y eso os digo que no divierte a nadie tras 3 o 4 partidas yendo gen rush.
Me he querido extender un poco en contaros mis experiencias estas semanas en el juego, para que tengáis claro que os vais a encontrar dentro. Al principio todo muy divertido, pero cuando llevas unas horas...
Os aseguro que el 90% de las partidas son como os he contado, prevenidos estáis.

이 게임을 플레이 하고싶으신 분들중 살인마를 플레이하실 의향이 있으실 분들은 돈을 아끼시길 바랍니다. 그 돈으로 차라리 다른 더 좋은 게임을 사시거나 치킨 한마리 시켜드십시오.
이 게임의 개발자들은 살인마를 생각해주지 않습니다. 오직 생존자만을 위한 게임을 만들어갑니다.
여러분이 정말 만약이라도 이 게임을 구매하여 플레이하실 생각이시라면 무조건 생존자만 하십시오, 혼자 하셔도 좋고 같이 플레이할 친구들이 있다면 다인큐를 돌리셔도 좋습니다. 생존자만 플레이 하신다면 매우 쾌적하고 즐거운 게임플레이를 하실 수 있습니다. 물론 살인마 유저가 없어 큐 잡히는데는 매우 오랜 시간이 걸릴 것입니다.
몇번이고 강조드립니다. 혹여 살인마 하실 생각은 접으시길 바랍니다. 방금도 말씀 드렸다시피 이 게임은 절대 생존자들을 위한 게임입니다. 살인마를 위한 게임이 아닙니다.
게임 장르 자체가 살인마 1명이 생존자 4명을 상대하는 불리한 조건에서 시작함에도 불구하고 살인마에게 유리한 밸런스가 아닌 현재 리뷰를 쓰는 2020년 2월 28일 기준 생존자들에게 압도적으로 유리한 밸런스를 갖춘 게임입니다. 다시 한번 말씀드립니다. 절대 살인마 할 생각마십시오.

If you're looking for a perfect game then don't look here but for those who can over look its flaws, its a lot of fun. This game requires a lot of strategy, skill, and thinking on the fly if you want to win and that goes both for killer and survivors. The game does offer a lot of options as to what kind of builds you can play around with but camping killers, survivor potatoes, hit boxes (sometimes seeming the size of mars), and bugs make the game frustrating/fun at times but with that said I do enjoy this game a lot and certainly wouldn't have put 60 plus hours into it if I thought the issues weren't worth overlooking.

They have a very good game in hands but the devs just care about making money, I am not saying that it is wrong but they launch new patches to make profit and ignore remaking perks and characters that is needed. If you ever play this game DO NEVER SPEND A SINGLE BUCK ON IT!! that is just not worth it.
Mostly you play with couple characters and couple sets of perks and that is it, the rest has NO USE, even the new ones.
The perks do not interact, meaning there is no cool combo to do with your friends in a trial (round). You have your and they have theirs.
Another very annoying thing is that your ability does not count in this game because they made sure of that, all abilities of good players will end on the idiot killer's hand. Why do I say idiot? because they have a  auto aim for killers and the hit box is so huge that if you are 4 meters, or more, from the killer you will still get hit and does not matter if you have an object in between you and even the survivor's position. In a nut shell, you WILL GET HIT.
Basically the game is made for killer to win most of the time.
I could have a huge list of faults of this game. like I said in the beginning, a good game in the wrong hands.
What a pity.

At first you're scared of the monsters, then you're not scared of them, and you may find the psychopathic beings erotic at some point. Please consult your local Doctor main about that last one, treatment is shockingly effective.

So I've played the game every day since I got it, and this is solely based on my experience as a new player, which I assume many of you reading this are also new. I plan on updating my review as I gain more experience.

CONS -
I'll be frank, the game does have a quite a few issues, particularly in wait times and matching
~ Matching: It really does suck to be a low level survivor and get a high level killer, or vice versa. It can also be particularly difficult if you plan on solo queuing often; there's no mic usage unless you're already in an existing party. If you solo queue, you mostly have to trust that your teammates know what they're doing. The only ways to communicate with them are via two emotes that signal "follow me" or point straight to say "over there". I personally only solo queue and personally this isn't bad enough to deter me from the game. I focus on the objective and I use perks to help me locate teammates/the killer so I can be more effective.
~ Queuing: On PS4, the wait times are ridiculous. Here on PC I haven't had many issues, I've waited at most 10 minutes, though I usually have to wait anywhere from 2-5 minutes.
~ Toxicity: I haven't encountered much of it, but I feel like there's the same amount of toxicity I see in a lot of other multi player games, and, remember you don't have to listen to people yell at you via mic in solo queue. People have a bit more liberty being toxic at the end of the match when there's a chat option. During the game, well, people can do the typical trolling things like sandbagging and just being useless to get on your nerves, or killers can teabag, tunnel, and camp. Also, I feel like this community finds a lot of things toxic, more than other gaming communities I've been in, so take that as you will.
~ Disconnecting (DC): This goes along with toxicity, but it deserves it's own spot. I haven't encountered a lot of issues with DC's, I've watched a few streamers on Twitch and the amount of DC's they experience I also feel are comparable to other games. Killers and survivors alike will disconnect sometimes if they get upset, which yeah can be frustrating, but again, it's frustrating in any game.

PROS:
~ Game style: I really love that this game goes beyond simply having "good aim" like other games. This is a lot about understanding how to play mind games and having to guess/understand what your opponent's next move will be. There's perks that will reveal where your opponent is or when they're nearby, which make it helpful to plan your move.
~ Play style: I appreciate the different play styles you can pick from. As a survivor, you can pack perks that help you be stealthy (good if you play solo), support, sabotage, etc. and you can always try and make a mix of two or more (i.e. support and stealth). I'm not experienced in killers, but the killers do have different strengths. I know from hearing other people that killers are not exactly where they need/should be, but, I've gone against some really good players. I think when you find your style and your main, with time and practice comes success.

Last thoughts: I hesitated a lot on buying this game because I read reviews and comments about all the cons. It wasn't until I read a review here that talked about how they avoided buying this game because their friends said it was trash but they're glad they bought it anyway that I decided to do the same. I don't regret buying the game at all despite it's flaws. I don't think any game is perfect and as long as you're aware of what the problems are and the return policies, then I say you give it a go.
